items.sentence: Could you please tell me how to get to the station?
How much did it cost you to eat at that restaurant?
I wasn't the only one who didn't get enough to eat.
No one is expected to come to work if they're sick.
Tom said that he was looking for a vending machine.
That sort of thing has been done many times before.
I have to sell my car, even though I don't want to.
When was the last time you wrote an article for us?
I'm sure that Tom will be happy to do that for you.
You're not the only one that's supposed to do that.
